src:
PREDLOZZI I TIPOVANJA (subota): Novo Sautemptonovo stradanje protiv Sitija, Torinom vlada Juve, Levandovski se sad nameračio na Ajntraht
Pročitajte nekoliko predloga za 2. novembar...

02 Nov 2019

NAPOMENA: U rubrici PREDLOZZI I TIPOVANJA novinari portala MOZZART Sport iznose svoje mišljenje povodom utakmica koje se igraju tog dana, i daju svoje viđenje koji bi ishod mogao da bude postignut na određenim parovima.

Šta vi mislite? Imate li svoje ideje, predloge, fikseve... koje biste podelili s drugima?


Ostavite svoj komentar ispod teksta...

Fiksevi dana
ENGLESKA 1 ID: 4488967
16:00 | Mančester Siti - Sautempton
Ove ekipe sastale su se u utorak na ovom istom terenu u Liga kupu i Mančester Siti je sa pola snage slavio sa 3:1. I sada smo uvereni u glatku pobedu domaćih, iz keca i uz dosta golova u oba poluvremena jer Sautempton još pati od "lesteritisa". U moru mogućnosti biramo DP 11.
Dupla pobeda: 1-1Kvota: 1.72Fiksevi dana
NEMAČKA 1 ID: 4488928
15:30 | Ajntraht Frankfurt - Bajern
Otkako je Niko Kovač klupu Ajntrahta zamenio Bajernovom nije imao obzira prema nekadašnjim poslodavcima - tri meča, tri pobede, gol-razlika 13:1. Bavarci generalno ne briljiraju, pogotovu u odbrani, ali imaju "ubicu" Roberta Levandovskog i s razlogom predlažemo KMB 2&3+.
Mozzart kombinazzije: 2&3+Kvota: 1.7Fiksevi dana
ŠPANIJA 1 ID: 4488970
18:30 | Sevilja - Atletiko Madrid
Osnovni razlog zbog kojeg Atletiko nije lider Primere je neefikasnost - dao je svega 11 golova u isto toliko kola. Ni Sevilja nije drastično ubojitija i sva je prilika da će ova obostrano vrlo značajna utakmica biti tvrda, a ne bi nas iznenadilo ni da dođe do podele bodova.
Ukupno golova: 0-2Kvota: 1.55Fiksevi dana
ITALIJA 1 ID: 4488772
20:45 | Torino - Juventus
Juventus je razočarao na prethodnom gostovanju u Lečeu i sigurni smo da vam je taj remi poobarao silne tikete. Dama nije blistala ni protiv Đenove, no gradski derbi je sasvim druga priča, tu će i Bikovi krenuti nešto agresivnije, što najavljuje GG3+. Naravno, dvojka je realna.
Konačan ishod: 2Kvota: 1.6Vredi probati
ENGLESKA 2 ID: 4489082
16:00 | Luton - Notingem Forest
Fudbaleri Notingem Foresta neplanirano su pauzirali prošlog vikenda zbog poplavljenog terena. Prethodno su vezali dva poraza, no Luton pruža izuzetno neubedljive partije zbog čega ćemo se usuditi da vam predložimo dvojku. Čini se da je i GG3+ dobar izbor, ali dvojka bolje plaća.
 
Konačan ishod: 2Kvota: 2.75Vredi probati
NEMAČKA 1 ID: 4488920
15:30 | Verder - Frajburg
Verder nešto lakše izlazi na kraj sa Frajburgom kao gost. No, sada je favorit (ali uz GG), uprkos tome što su belo-crni hit dosadašnjeg dela sezone, a razlog za keca su povrede njihovog standardnog golmana Aleksandera Švolova i najboljeg igrača i strelca Đan-Luke Valdšmita.
Konačan ishod: 1Kvota: 2.05Vredi probati
NEMAČKA 2 ID: 4489079
13:00 | Ercgebirge Aue - Hajdenhajm
Rivali su u sličnim formama, pa nijedan ishod ne bi bio iznenađujuć. Hajdenhajm nije rđav gost, međutim, Ercgebirge je jedan od retkih drugoligaša koji nisu doživeli poraz na svom terenu, pa kada se te dve informacije saberu dobije se kec kao sasvim realan i primamljiv izbor.
Konačan ishod: 1Kvota: 2.55Za izbegavanje
NEMAČKA 1 ID: 4488944
15:30 | Leverkuzen - Menhengladbah
Menhengladah drži prvo mesto na tabeli Bundes lige, dok Leverkuzenu već neko vreme loše ide. Pored toga, Ždrepcima nije strano pobeđivanje na BajAreni i dvojka nije isključena, mada Aspirindžije kad-tad moraju da prorade. Zbog svega toga najbolje je da preskočite ovaj par.
Konačan ishod: 1Kvota: 2.05
text:
SUGGESTIONS AND TYPES (Saturday): New Southampton Suffering Against City, Turin by Juve, Levandovski Now Into Eintracht
Read some suggestions for November 2 ...

02 Nov 2019

NOTE: In the PROPOSALS AND TYPES section, MOZZART Sport reporters give their opinions on the matches played that day, and give their views on what outcome could be achieved in certain pairs.

What do you think? Do you have any ideas, suggestions, fixes ... to share with others?


Leave your comment below ...

Fixes of the day
ENGLISH 1 ID: 4488967
16:00 | Manchester City - Southampton
These teams met on Tuesday in this same League Cup ground and Manchester City celebrated 3-1 with half power. And now we are convinced of a smooth win by the home side, from the ace and with plenty of goals in both halves as Southampton are still suffering from "lesteritis". In the sea of possibilities we choose DP 11.
Double Win: 1-1Quotes: 1.72Pixels of the Day
GERMANY 1 ID: 4488928
15:30 | Eintracht Frankfurt - Bayern
Ever since Nico Kovac replaced Eintracht with Bayern, he had no regard for his former employers - three matches, three wins, a goal difference of 13: 1. The Bavarians are generally not brilliant, especially in defense, but they have a "killer" Robert Levandovsky and we suggest KMB 2 & 3 + for a reason.
Mozzart Combinations: 2 & 3 + Odds: 1.7Fixes of the day
SPAIN 1 ID: 4488970
18:30 | Sevilla - Atletico Madrid
The main reason Atletico is not the leader of Primera is the inefficiency - he only scored 11 goals in as many rounds. Neither is Seville drastically more murderous and there is every chance that this mutually significant game will be tough, and it would not surprise us to even score points.
Total Goals: 0-2Quotes: 1.55Fixed Days
ITALY 1 ID: 4488772
20:45 | Turin - Juventus
Juventus was disappointed with their previous appearance in Lecce and we are sure that this draw has given you a lot of tickets. The lady did not shine against Genoa either, but the city derby is a different story; the Bulls will go a little more aggressively, as announced by GG3 +. Of course, the two are realistic.
Final Outcome: 2Quotes: 1.6Worth a try
ENGLISH 2 ID: 4489082
16:00 | Luton - Nottingham Forest
Nottingham Forest fans paused unplanned last weekend because of flooded terrain. Previously they have tied two defeats, but Luton provides extremely unconvincing parties, which is why we will dare to suggest a two. GG3 + also seems to be a good choice, but the two pay better.

Final Outcome: 2Quotes: 2.75Worth to try
GERMANY 1 ID: 4488920
15:30 | Werder - Freiburg
Werder finds it easier to cope with Freiburg as a guest. But now he is the favorite (but with GG), despite being the white-and-black hit of the season so far, and the reason for the ace is injuries to their standard goalkeeper Alexander Schwolves and best player and scorer Gian-Luke Waldsmith.
Final Outcome: 1Quotes: 2.05 Worth a try
GERMANY 2 ID: 4489079
13:00 | Ercgebirge Aue - Heidenheim
Rivals are in similar forms, so no outcome would be surprising. Heidenheim is not a bad guest, however, Ercgebirge is one of the few second-teamers who has not lost in their home ground, so when they gather that information they get an ace as a very realistic and enticing choice.
Final Outcome: 1Quotes: 2.55To avoid
GERMANY 1 ID: 4488944
15:30 | Leverkusen - Mönchengladbach
Menhengladah holds the top spot in the Bundes League standings, while Leverkusen has been going bad for some time. In addition, Ždrepci is no stranger to winning the BajArena and the two are not ruled out, though Aspirinji has to work. Because of all this, it's best to skip this pair.
Final Outcome: 1Quotes: 2.05
